arts.ttl: 5 reasons Borussia Dortmund will beat Juventus in the UEFA Champions League
arts.sum: After steering Dortmund into the Champions League last season, winning seven and drawing one of their last eight Bundesliga games, Kovač was rewarded with a new two-year contract by the Black-Yellows. The Italian giants will provide tough opposition, but Dortmund’s star striker Serhou Guirassy and new faces ready to make their mark are just two reasons why they will leave Turin with all three points...

arts.ttl: Juventus vs. Borussia Dortmund: UEFA Champions League team news and LIVE blog!
arts.sum: Kovač has only lost two of 17 Champions League matches as a head coach with Dortmund and Bayern Munich (W10, D5). Borussia Dortmund will look to get their UEFA Champions League campaign off to the perfect start when they face Juventus at the Allianz Stadium on Tuesday (kick-off: 9pm CEST).

arts.ttl: Anselmino out, Groß doubtful for Dortmund's clash with Juventus
arts.sum: Aaron Anselmino has been ruled out of Borussia Dortmund's Champions League opener against Juventus on Tuesday. Pascal Groß is a big doubt.
